pma:database.name: db_name
pma:database.pma:table: CREATE TABLE `sneaker` ( `sneakerID` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `brand` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci DEFAULT NULL, `sku` varchar(50) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci DEFAULT NULL, `modell` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci DEFAULT NULL, `itemCondition` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci DEFAULT NULL, `age` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci DEFAULT NULL, `colorway` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci DEFAULT NULL, `buy_shop` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci DEFAULT NULL, `sell_shop` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci DEFAULT NULL, `buy_date` date DEFAULT NULL, `sell_date` date DEFAULT NULL, `sold` tinyint(1) DEFAULT NULL, `size` float DEFAULT NULL, `buying_price` decimal(11,2) DEFAULT NULL, `selling_price` decimal(11,2) DEFAULT NULL, `shipping_fee` decimal(11,2) DEFAULT NULL, `transaction_fee` decimal(11,2) DEFAULT NULL, `payout` decimal(11,2) DEFAULT NULL, `profit` decimal(11,2) DEFAULT NULL, `invoiceNumber` varchar(50) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci DEFAULT NULL, `purchase_invoice` int(1) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`sneakerID`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=1 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;
